pinyin: luan4 gao3 nan2 nu:3 guan1 xi4

definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to do/to make/to go in for/to set up/to get hold of/to take care of
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
